column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our first visit to Bavettes was incredible. Our waiter
column3: was arguably the best waiter we have ever had
column4: attentive and friendly. We ordered shrimp cocktail (massive and delicious) and beef tongue for appetizers. The beef tongue
column7: almost similar to slices of beef brisket seared well. The bone-in filet was possibly the best steak I have ever had and the garlic mashed potatoes awesome. We ended our dinner with the chocolate cream pie - not a pudding
column9: not a cream but a delightful combination of the three.
